scripts.deploy-prep: git checkout main && npm run build && git add . && git commit -m 'Build y commit de la carpeta dist' && git push origin main && mkdir -p ../temp-dist && cp -r dist/* ../temp-dist/
scripts.deploy-finalize: git checkout deploy && git rm -r * && git commit -m 'Preparando branch para Deploy' && git push && cp -r ../temp-dist/* . && git add . && git commit -m 'Deploy!' && git push origin deploy && rm -rf ../temp-dist
